targetString: Uma kwenzeka kuba nokusondelana kakhulu lapho umuntu etholakala, izisebenzi kufanele zihlanze futhi zisuse amagciwane emabhandeni azo omsebenzi nezinto ezizigqokile ngaphambi kokuba ziphinde zizisebenzise ngesifutho noma indwangu yokuhlanza yasendlini, futhi balandele izinqubo ezivamile zokuvimbela ukusakazeka kwegciwane nokulahlwa kwe-PPE esetshenzisiwe nangokugcina nokuwasha izingubo.
en-mt: In the event of close contact, workers should clean and disinfect their work belts and clothing before reuse with a spray or household cleaning cloth, and follow standard procedures to prevent the spread of the virus and dispose of used PPE and store and wash clothing.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: I-OSHA icabangela ukuthi izisebenzi ezithile zezokwelapha nezasemakhazeni zisengozini enkulu noma enkulu kakhulu yokuchayeka esifweni.
en-mt: OSHA considers certain medical and cold storage workers to be at high or very high risk of exposure to the disease.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Imisebenzi yabachayeke engozini enkulu ihlanganisa abathumela izinto zokwelapha, izinto zokusiza, abasemalabhorethri, nezisebenzi ezithutha izinto zokwelapha ezichayeke ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19.
en-mt: High-risk occupations include dispatchers of medical supplies, aid supplies, laboratory workers, and workers transporting medical supplies who have been exposed to patients with known or suspected COVID-19.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Lezi ziba izingozi ezinkulu kakhulu zokuchayeka esifweni uma izisebenzi zenza izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol, noma eziqongelela noma zisingathe amasampula, avela ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19.
en-mt: These become the greatest risks of exposure to the disease if workers perform procedures that generate aerosols, or collect or handle samples, from patients with known or suspected cases of COVID-19.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol zihlanganisa ukufakwa kweshubhu emzimbeni, izinqubo ezibangela ukukhwehlela, i-bronchoscopies, izinqubo nokuhlola okuthile kwamazinyo, noma ukuqoqwa kwamasampula omzimba.
en-mt: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough procedures, bronchoscopies, certain dental procedures and tests, or collection of body samples.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Imisebenzi yasemakhazeni yokuchayeka esifweni enobungozi kakhulu ihlanganisa izisebenzi ezihileleke ekulungiseleleni izidumbu zabantu abanezigameko ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi bane-COVID-19 lapho befa; lezi ziba ubungozi obukhulu kakhulu uma zihlola izidumbu. Izilawuli ezengeziwe zonjiniyela zala maqembu obungozi zihlanganisa amagumbi okuhlaliswa wedwa eziguli ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19, okuhlanganisa lapho kwenziwa izinqubo zokusungulwa kwe-aerosol.
en-mt: High-risk morgue jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people with known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of death; these become even more dangerous when examining corpses. Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol creation procedures are performed.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Ukungena komoya okukhethekile ngomfutho onegathivu kungafaneleka kwamanye amasethingi ezokwelashwa nawasemakhazeni.
en-mt: Special negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some clinical and cryogenic settings.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Amasampula kufanele asingathwe ngeziqondiso zokuphepha ze-Biosafety Level 3.
en-mt: Samples should be handled according to Biosafety Level 3 guidelines.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: I-World Health Organization (WHO) ikhuthaza ukuba iziguli ezifikayo zihlukaniswe zifakwe ezindaweni zokulinda ezihlukile kuye ngokuthi kunezinsolo yini zokuthi zine-COVID-19. Ngaphezu kwenye i-PPE, i-OSHA ikhuthaza ama-respirator kulabo abasebenza beqhelelene ngamafithi angu-6 neziguli ezaziwayo, noma okunezinsolo, zokuthi zinegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2, nalabo abenza izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into different waiting areas depending on whether they are suspected of having COVID-19. In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those working 6 feet away from patients known, or suspected, to be infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing procedures that generate aerosols.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: E-United States, ama-respirator ayisembozo sobuso esihlungayo e-N95 agunyazwe yi-NIOSH noma angcono kunawo kumelwe asetshenziswe njengendlela yohlelo lokuzivikela ngama-respirator olubhaliwe oluphelele, olubandakanya ukuhlolwa kokuba umqemane, ukuzivocavoca, nokuhlolwa kwezokwelashwa.
en-mt: In the United States, N95 filter facepiece respirators approved by NIOSH or better must be used as part of a complete written respirator protection program, which includes a fitness test, exercise, and medical examination.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Ezinye izinhlobo zama-respirator zingavikela kakhudlwana futhi zithuthukise ukuphatheka kahle kwesisebenzi. I-WHO ayiwakhuthazi ama-coveralls, ngoba i-COVID-19 iyisifo esingena ngokuhogelwa hhayi ngokudluliselwa ngoketshezi olusemzimbeni.
en-mt: Some types of respirators can be more protective and improve worker comfort. WHO does not recommend coveralls, because COVID-19 is an inhalational disease and not transmitted through body fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: I-WHO ikhuthaza kuphela imaski yokuhlinza ezisebenzini ezihlungayo ezindaweni okungenwa kuzo.
en-mt: WHO only recommends surgical masks for screening workers at entry points.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Kulabo abaqongelela amasampula okuhogela, abanakekela, noma abahambisa iziguli ze-COVID-19 ngaphandle kwezinqubo zokusungula i-aerosol, i-WHO ikhuthaza imaski yokuhlinza, izibuko, noma i-face shield, igawuni, namagilavu.
en-mt: For those collecting inhalation samples, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Uma kwenziwa inqubo yokusungula i-aerosol, kufakwa i-N95 noma i-respirator ye-FFP2 esikhundleni semaski yokuhlinza.
en-mt: When an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, an N95 or FFP2 respirator is used instead of a surgical mask.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Ngenxa yokuthi i-PPE ayitholakali ngokwanele emhlabeni, i-WHO ikhuthaza ukunciphisa isidingo se-PPE ngokuxhumana neziguli ngocingo, izivimbeli ezingokoqobo njengamafasitela abonisa ngale, okuvumela kuphela labo abahileleke ngokuqondile ekwelapheni ukuba bangene egunjini elinesiguli esine-COVID-19, basebenzise kuphela i-PPE edingekayo emsebenzini othile, baqhubeke besebenzisa i-respirator efanayo ngaphandle kokuyikhipha kuyilapho benakekela iziguli eziningi ezinesifo esifanayo, beqapha futhi belawula ukutholakala kwe-PPE, futhi benqabela ukusetshenziswa kwamamaski kubantu abangenazimpawu zesifo.
en-mt: Because PPE is not available enough in the world, WHO advocates reducing the need for PPE by communicating with patients over the phone, physical barriers such as transparent windows, allowing only those directly involved in treatment to enter the room with a patient with COVID-19, using only the necessary PPE in one practice, they continued to use the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same disease, monitoring and controlling the availability of PPE, and prohibiting the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: IVELA KU-: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
en-mt: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: IYA: Kuzo zonke izisebenzi ze-Wikimedia Foundation
en-mt: TO: To all Wikimedia Foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: IPHATHELENE: [Covid-19] Ukunciphisa umthwalo nokulungela isikhathi esizayo
en-mt: RELATED: [Covid-19] Burden reduction and future preparedness

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: USUKU/ISIKHATHI SOKUTHUMELA: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: POST DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: ILAYISENSI: CC0: Awekho amalungelo agodliwe
en-mt: LICENSE: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Sizithola sisesimweni esiphawulekayo kule nyanga.
en-mt: We find ourselves in a remarkable situation this month.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Umqedazwe we-COVID-19 uyinto eyenza icace indlela abantu emhlabeni abaxhumene ngayo nomthwalo esinawo komunye nomunye.
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic is something that makes clear how connected people in the world are and the burden we have on each other.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Asikaze sibhekane nezinselele ezifuze lena, kodwa siyazi ukuthi indlela esisabela ngayo ixhomeke ohlotsheni lokuzwelana emhlabeni, ukusebenzelana kahle, nokwakhiwa komphakathi okungumgogodla wale nhlangano.
en-mt: We have never faced challenges like this, but we know that the way we respond depends on the kind of empathy in the world, good cooperation, and community building which is the core of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Ukubambisana nokunakekelana esikubonile kuzo zonke izisebenzi zethu ngama-imeyili, izingcingo, nezingxoxo kuyisiqinisekiso esiphawulekayo sokuthi sinabantu abahle esinenhlanhla yokusebenza nabo.
en-mt: The cooperation and care we have seen from all our employees through emails, phone calls, and conversations is a remarkable confirmation that we have good people that we are lucky to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Ngiyajabula ngempela futhi ngiyaziqhenya ngokusebenza kanye nani.
en-mt: I am really happy and proud to work with you.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Ngeviki elidlule, othile wangitshela awazisa ngayo umsebenzi wethu.
en-mt: Last week, someone told me how much they appreciate our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Wangikhumbuza indlela okunengqondo ngayo ngomhlaba ukuba ukwazi ukuvula i-Wikipedia njengamanje, futhi lolu uphawu olunamandla ngalo mthombo osemqoka ukuba uhlale utholakala ku-inthanethi futhi utholakala kuwo wonke umuntu.
en-mt: He reminded me how much sense of the world it makes to be able to open Wikipedia right now, and it's a powerful sign of this important resource to remain online and available to everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Umsebenzi wenu wenza lokhu kwenzeke, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi nigcina amasayithi evulekile noma izisebenzi zethu zikhokhelwe noma imiphakathi yethu ivikelekile.
en-mt: Your work makes this possible, whether it's keeping our sites open or our workers paid or our communities protected.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Umhlaba uyaludinga ulwazi olutholakala ku-Wikipedia, manje kunanini ngaphambili.
en-mt: The world needs the information found on Wikipedia, now more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Lesi yisikhathi lapho kungekhona kuphela lokho esikwenzayo, kodwa nendlela esikwenza ngayo, okuzoba negalelo elinamandla emhlabeni.
en-mt: This is the time when not only what we do, but how we do it, will have a powerful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Ngenxa yokubaluleka kwalo msebenzi nendima yenu kuwo, sizokwenza izinguquko ezinkulu endleleni esisebenzelana ngayo, kusukela evikini elizayo.
en-mt: Because of the importance of this work and your role in it, we will be making major changes to the way we work together, starting next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Izinguquko emsebenzini wethu namashejuli
en-mt: Changes to our work and schedules

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Njengoba uRobyn eshilo ngaphambilini, ithimba-c liye lahlangana izolo kusihlwa laxoxa ngendlela esizosebenza ngayo neshejuli yethu yezinsuku nezinyanga ezizayo.
en-mt: As Robyn mentioned earlier, the c-team met yesterday evening to discuss how we will work and our schedule for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Kuleyo ngxoxo, siye sacabangela lokho esibe nomuzwa wokuthi kuzoba ukusabela kahle kulokho esibhekene nakho nendlela engcono kakhulu yokugcina inhlangano iqhubeka phakathi nalesi sikhathi.
en-mt: In that discussion, we considered what we felt would be the best response to what we are facing and the best way to keep the organization going during this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Singalindele besifuna ukususa ukucindezeleka futhi sisekele umgomo wethu wenkathi ende.
en-mt: We unexpectedly wanted to relieve stress and support our long-term goal.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Uma kudingeka uphinde usishayele, kulungile.
en-mt: If you need to call us again, that's fine.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Kuzo zonke izisebenzi, izinkampane zenkontileka, nezisebenzi zenkontileka:
en-mt: For all employees, contractors, and contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: umsebenzi wethu olindelekile wansuku zonke uzoba amahora angaba ngu-4 ngosuku, noma amahora angu-20 ngeviki kuze kumenyezelwe ushintsho.
en-mt: our expected daily work will be approximately 4 hours per day, or 20 hours per week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Asimemezeli iholidi - uma ukwazi ukusebenza amahora avamile engeziwe, inkampane ingakusebenzisa.
en-mt: We don't announce holidays - if you can work extra normal hours, the company can use you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Nokho, izinto aziqinisekile emhlabeni manje, futhi kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kudingeka unakekele abantu obathandayo, uthenge ukudla, noma uye kwadokotela, impilo yakho iza kuqala kithi.
en-mt: However, things are uncertain in the world today, and whether you need to take care of your loved ones, buy food, or go to the doctor, your health comes first to us.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Ngeke sisilandelele isikhathi osisebenzayo.
en-mt: We will not track the time you spend.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Uma ugula, ungasebenzi.
en-mt: If you are sick, don't work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Asikho ngempela isidingo sokukusho lokhu, kodwa sizokusho.
en-mt: We don't really need to say this, but we will.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Akudingeki ufake izinsuku zokugula noma i-PTO - uzomane utshele imenenja yakho futhi usize ithimba osebenza nalo ukuba lihlele kabusha amakhalenda namashejuli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izingxenye ezisemqoka zomsebenzi ziyafezwa.
en-mt: You don't have to include sick days or PTO - you'll just tell your manager and help your team reorganize calendars and schedules to make sure key parts of the job get done.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Uma kutholakala ukuthi unegciwane le-COVID-19, sicela utshele uBryan phakathi kwama-T&C Ops ukuze i-T&C ikwazi ukusiza ngokusekela futhi iqinisekise ukuthi isimo sakho sinakekelwa abaphathi ngendlela efanele).
en-mt: (If you test positive for COVID-19, please notify Bryan during T&C Ops so T&C can assist with support and ensure your condition is properly managed).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Izisebenzi ezisebenza ngamahora zizokhokhelwa ngokugcwele.
en-mt: Hourly workers will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Kakade sishilo, futhi siyazijuba ukuba sifeze izibopho zethu ezisebenzini zethu zenkontileka nalezo ezisebenza ngamahora.
en-mt: We have already said, and we are committed to fulfilling our obligations to our contract and hourly workers.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Wonke umuntu uzokhokhelwa ngokwamahora akhe avamile abewasebenza ezimweni ezivamile.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid according to their normal hours worked under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Lokhu kuhlanganisa nalapho ugula futhi ungakwazi ukusebenza.
en-mt: This includes when you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Uma ufuna ukusebenza, siyakusekela.
en-mt: If you want to work, we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Abantu abaningi basebenzisa umsebenzi njengendlela yokwenza ukucindezeleka kwabo kuhambisane nezinto ezisizungezile.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to deal with their stress.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Esikwenzayo kungaba nomvuzo oyingqayizivele, ikakhulukazi ezikhathini ezinjengalesi.
en-mt: What we do can be exceptionally rewarding, especially in times like this.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Siyaphinda futhi, kubalulekile ukuba uzinakekele.
en-mt: Again, it's important to take care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Sikucela ukuba uxhumane nemenenja yakho, ukuze sazi lokho esingakulindela futhi sihlele ngokuvumelana nakho.
en-mt: We ask that you contact your manager, so that we know what to expect and plan accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Omunye umsebenzi ubhekwa njengosemqoka.
en-mt: Some work is considered essential.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Kunezinto okumelwe siqhubeke sizenza.
en-mt: There are things we must continue to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Amathimba e-SRE, e-HR Ops, e-Trust & Safety, nawe-Fundraising (phakathi kwamanye) enza umsebenzi obucayi ongase udinge ukusekelwa okwengeziwe.
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Sizoqala inqubo nayo yonke iminyango ukuze sihlole imigomo yamanje futhi sigudluzele ukugxila kwethu ekusekeleni lokho okubalulekile emgomweni wethu.
en-mt: We will begin a process with all departments to review current goals and shift our focus to supporting what is important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Kuningi sonke okufanele sikwenze, sizomane sigxile sonke kumaphrojekthi asemqoka kakhulu.
en-mt: We all have a lot to do, we'll just focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Ukunciphisa ijubane manje ngeke kusilimaze kamuva.
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt us later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Asihleli “ukusebenza ngokuphindiwe ukuze sibambe ishejuli” lapho umqedazwe usudlulile.
en-mt: We are not planning to "work hard to keep up with the schedule" when the pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Ngeke kulindeleke ukuba usebenze amahora engeziwe ukuze uqede umsebenzi ngesikhathi esingavamile kwamanje.
en-mt: You will not be expected to work extra hours to complete the work at this unusual time.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Siyakwamukela ukuthi izimo zishintshile, futhi sizosebenzela ekubekeni imigomo nezikhathi ezintsha lapho kufaneleka khona.
en-mt: We accept that circumstances have changed, and we will work on setting new goals and timelines where appropriate.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Kwenzekani nge-APP (i-Annual Planning)?
en-mt: What happened to APP (Annual Planning)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Ukuze ushintshele ezimweni zethu ezintsha nasemahoreni omsebenzi esiwalindele nsuku zonke, sihlose ukushintsha inkathi yokuthunyelwa kwe-Annual Plan yethu ka-2020-2021.
en-mt: In order to adapt to our new conditions and the working hours we expect every day, we intend to change the posting period of our Annual Plan for 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Inhloso yethu iwukusikisela ukwelulwa kohlelo lwethu lwango-2019-2020 oluvumela isikhathi esengeziwe sokwenza ibhajethi yokuvumela izisebenzi ukuba zenze imisebenzi ebucayi kuqala, zizinakekele zona, futhi zinakekele abantu ezibathandayo kuyilapho zisiza nalabo abadinga noma abafisa ukusebenza ishejuli encishisiwe emavikini ambalwa azayo.
en-mt: Our intention is to propose an extension to our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time to budget to allow employees to prioritize critical tasks, care for themselves, and care for loved ones while also helping those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Lokhu kwelulwa kwenkathi yokusebenza inciphisa kakhulu umsebenzi ohlelelwe manje nengcindezi ekuyo yonke inhlangano.
en-mt: This extension of the working period greatly reduces the workload and pressure on the entire organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Sizokwethula lokho esikuhlongozayo kuBhodi ngeviki elizayo futhi sibuyekeze abameleli namathimba ezinyathelweni ezilandelayo ngokushesha nje lapho sesinesiqinisekiso.
en-mt: We will present our proposals to the Board next week and update representatives and teams on next steps as soon as we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Siyalibonga ithimba le-APP ngokuhola kulokhu.
en-mt: Thanks to the APP team for taking the lead on this.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Isimo sehhovisi, ukuchayeka, nokuhlanza
en-mt: Office environment, exposure, and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Ngeviki elidlule, sifunde ukuthi esinye isisebenzi sethu esiyi-SF kungenzeka sichayeke egciwaneni le-COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our SF employees may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Nokho, ngenxa yokukhathazeka okukhulu, sithumele iqembu elihlanza ngokususa amagciwane ukuba lisuse amagciwane kuzo zonke izindawo zehhovisi lase-San Francisco.
en-mt: However, out of concern, we sent a disinfection team to disinfect all areas of the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Lisebenzise insipho yasezibhedlela eyisibulali-magciwane ukuze lisuse amagciwane yonke indawo, kanye nasendaweni yokwamukela izivakashi nasezindaweni zama-elevator ezingenela endaweni esikuyo.
en-mt: Use hospital grade disinfectant soap to disinfect all surfaces, including the lobby and elevator access areas to our facility.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Isakhiwo sisebenzisa iphrothokholi yaso yokunakekelwa ngokusebenzisa imikhiqizo esekela ukuphepha kwamathenenti aso.
en-mt: The building implements its maintenance protocol by using products that support the safety of its tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Sizizwa sikhululekile ukuthi ihhovisi lizobe selilungile lapho sesinquma ukuphindela kulo.
en-mt: We feel relieved that the office will be ready when we decide to return to it.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Ihhovisi lethu le-DC lise-WeWork, elabelene nathi iphrothokholi yalo ye-COVID-19 kanye nazo zonke izisebenzi ezise-DC.
en-mt: Our DC office is at WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all employees in DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Kusukela ngeviki elidlule, ihhovisi lethu le-DC lithuthele endaweni eqhelile esethwe ngokuphelele ngokuvumelana nesiqondiso esinikezwe i-San Francisco.
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office has moved to a remote location that is completely set up in accordance with the direction given by San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Njengoba ezinye izisebenzi zethu zase-NYC zazi, besilokhu sixoxa ngokuqasha indawo e-Brooklyn.
en-mt: As some of our NYC staff know, we have been discussing renting a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Lezi zingxoxo ziyaqhubeka kodwa zingase zithathe isikhathi.
en-mt: These negotiations are ongoing but may take some time.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Ezinye izisebenzi zethu zisebenzela kude okokuqala ngqa.
en-mt: Some of our employees are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Izisebenzi zethu ezinesikhathi eside zisebenzela kude ziyazi ukuthi kungaba ushintsho olukhulu, futhi zifuna ukuninika icebiso:
en-mt: Our long-time remote workers know it can be a big change, and they want to give you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Nciphisani ubude bemihlangano ibe okungenani yihora elilodwa noma amabili.
en-mt: Limit the length of meetings to at least one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Uma kudingeka imihlangano emide, cabangelani indlela eningayihlukanisa ngayo phakathi nezinsuku eziningana.
en-mt: If long meetings are required, consider how you can spread them over several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Chazani ngokucacile ukuthi umhlangano umayelana nani, yibani ne-agenda, futhi nithumele izinto okufanele zifundwe kusenesikhathi.
en-mt: Explain clearly what the meeting is about, have an agenda, and send out reading materials ahead of time.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Wenzeni njalo ngevidiyo, ngamathuluzi anjenge-Google Docs ne-Zoom ukuze nisebenze futhi nixhumane bukhoma.
en-mt: Do it all over video, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to work and communicate live.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Yibani nomuntu ozohola ukuze ahlele yonke imihlangano, othile ozobheka imibuzo ezingxoxweni futhi alandelele uhlu lwabazokhuluma, nothile ozosiza ekubhaleni amanothi (noma nibhale amanothi ninonke).
en-mt: Have someone in charge to organize all the meetings, someone to check the interview questions and keep track of the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or take notes together).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Thumelani i-imeyili kwabasekela ngezobuchwepheshe uma nidinga ihedisethi ekahle.
en-mt: Email tech support if you need a good headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Sebenzisani imali yenu yenhlalakahle ekuthengeni okuhlafunwayo.
en-mt: Use your welfare money to buy chewing gum.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Joyinani ishaneli ethi #remoties ku-Slack ukuze nixoxe nozakwenu ngomsebenzi othunyelwayo
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel on Slack to chat with your colleagues about the work you are sending

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ithimba le-HR Operations lifuna isiqondiso kumasemina e-inthanethi ngezindlela eziphumelelayo zokusebenza ukuze kusekelwe ukwanda emsebenzini othunyelwayo kuyo yonke Inkampane.
en-mt: The HR Operations team is looking for guidance in webinars on effective ways to work to support increased workload across the Company.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Kuleli viki elidlule sicele bonke abamukela imali yeqolo emphakathini ukuba bakhansele izenzakalo zomphakathi ezixhaswa yi-Wikimedia, njengama-editathons, i-WHO ize imemezele ukuthi lo mqedazwe usuphelile.
en-mt: This past week we asked all public funders to cancel public events sponsored by Wikimedia, such as editathons, until the WHO declares that the epidemic is over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Sizobatshela ukuthi siye saqonda ukuthi isicelo sethu sokukhansela neminye imingcele ingenza kungenzeki ukuqedela imisebenzi yabo yemali yeqolo okuvunyelenwe ngayo nokuthi akekho ozohlawuliswa ngokwephuza noma ukushintsha leyo migomo.
en-mt: We will tell them that we understand that our request for cancellation and other restrictions will make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon payment obligations and that no one will be penalized for delaying or changing those terms.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Kuleli viki elizayo sizolandelela ngesinye isiqondiso ku-Wikimania namanye amakhonferensi omphakathi esifundazwe kanye nawezigaba.
en-mt: This coming week we will follow up with another guide to Wikimania and other provincial and regional community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Umuzwa ovamile womphakathi emhlabeni ubonakala uwukudangala ngokuphazamiseka kodwa ukukhululeka ngokucaciselwa namathuba okugxila emiphakathini yabo, i-Wikimedia kanye nokunye.
en-mt: The general feeling of the community around the world seems to be one of dismay at the disruption but relief at the clarity and opportunities to focus on their communities, Wikimedia and more.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, i-CRT isebenzela ukusetha ikhasi ku-Meta-Wiki ukuze kunikezwe isikhala somphakathi ukuze ubheke igalelo elibe khona futhi ulandele izingxoxo zethu nawo.
en-mt: Over time, CRT is working on setting up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to view contributions and follow our discussions with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Ukuhlala sixhumene ngezindaba ezihlobene ne-COVID-19
en-mt: Staying connected on issues related to COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Sizothumela isimemo kumakhalenda akho ngoLwesine oluzayo, ngo-14:00 UTC/07:00 PT somhlangano okhethekile wezisebenzi.
en-mt: We will post an invitation to your calendars next Thursday, at 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Sizosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukuze sabelane ngezinye izibuyekezo, siphendule imibuzo yakho futhi sichithe isikhathi esithile sixhumana.
en-mt: We will use this time to share some updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Sisebenza ndawonye futhi sizokusiza nomaphi lapho sikwazi khona.
en-mt: We work together and will help you wherever we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Okwamanje, ungaqhubeka uthola ulwazi kule imeyili, nalo lonke olunye ulwazi olusemqoka lwe-COVID-19 oluhlobene, ku-Office Wiki.
en-mt: In the meantime, you can continue to receive information on this email, and all other important COVID-19 related information, on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: I-CRT izogcina la makhasi ebuyekeziwe nalo lonke ulwazi lusendaweni eyodwa.
en-mt: CRT will keep these pages updated and all information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Siyasebenza futhi ukuze sigcine ukuxhumana kwasikhathi sonke nezisebenzi ezihlala emazweni okwamanje athinteke kakhulu.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain full-time contact with staff living in countries currently most affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Uma unemibuzo ngokuhamba, izenzakalo, umzila womsebenzi omkhulu, inselele yekhavareji, nanoma yini enye ongase udinge usizo kuyo, sicela unganqikazi ukutshela futhi usebenze ne-CRT.
en-mt: If you have questions about travel, events, a major job route, a coverage challenge, or anything else you might need help with, please don't hesitate to tell and work with CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Silapha ukuze sisize ekusekeleni nasekuxhumaniseni uma kudingeka.
en-mt: We are here to help support and coordinate if needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Uma unendaba eyimfihlo noma ebucayi, sicela uthumele i-imeyili kuBryan Judan - Umqondisi we-HR International Global Operations.
en-mt: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please send an email to Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Azikho kulezi zinguquko okufanele zibhekwe njengokushiya umsebenzi nezibopho zethu.
en-mt: None of these changes should be considered a departure from our duties and responsibilities.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Kunalokho, ziwukuqaphela ukuthi kulesi sikhathi, umsebenzi nezibopho zethu cishe kuzodinga ukuvunyelaniswa ngendlela engakaze ibe khona ngaphambili.
en-mt: Rather, they are a recognition that at this time, our work and responsibilities will probably need to be coordinated like never before.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Lezi izinyathelo ezikholelwa ukuthi ziyadingeka ukuze sisekelane ukuze siqhubeke nomsebenzi, sinikeze iqembu lethu ukusekela elikudingayo, nomhlaba siwunike isevisi othembele kuyo.
en-mt: These steps we believe are necessary to support each other to continue the work, give our team the support they need, and provide the world with the service you rely on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Umsebenzi esiwuhlelile uzobe usilindile uma isikhathi sifika.
en-mt: The work we have planned will be waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Okwamanje, yisikhathi sokusekelana futhi kwakhiwe isikhala somsebenzi obalulekile ongase ube khona emavikini kanye nasezinyangeni ezizayo.
en-mt: In the meantime, it's time to support each other and create space for important work that may take place in the weeks and months ahead.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Sidinga ukuba nonke nikwenze kwenzeke lokho, ngakho sidinga ukuba nonke nizinakekele nina nemindeni yenu ukuze nibe senikulungele ngokugcwele lapho isidingo siphakama.
en-mt: We need all of you to make that happen, so we need all of you to take care of yourselves and your families so that you are fully prepared when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Manje, siyacela -- gezani izandla zenu futhi ningazithinti ebusweni!
en-mt: Now, please -- wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: UKatherine, i-CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), nalo lonke Ithimba Labaholi (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the entire Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: I-b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) yi-enzyme ehlezi ngaphandle (kulwelwesi lweseli) kwamaseli emaphashini, imithambo, inhliziyo, izinso, namathumbu.
en-mt: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme that sits outside (on the cell membrane) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: I-ACE2 ilwa nokusebenza kwe-angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) ngokunciphisa inani le-angiotensin-II nokukhuphula i-Ang(1-7) iyenze ibe umuthi othembisayo wokwelapha izifo zenhliziyo negazi. I-ACE2 iphinde isebenze njengendawo yokungena kumaseli kuma-coronavirus athile.
en-mt: ACE2 counteracts the action of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 also acts as a cell entry point for certain coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Uhlobo lomuntu lwe-enzyme kuvame ukubhekiselwa kulo ngokuthi yi-hACE2.
en-mt: The human form of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: I-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 iyi-metalloenzyme ene-zinc etholakala ebusweni be-endothelial namanye amaseli.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme found on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Iphrotheni le-ACE2 liqukethe idomeyini ye-N-terminal peptidase M2 kanye nedomeyini ye-C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: I-ACE2 iyiphrotheni yolwelwesi ewuhlobo I olunomzila owodwa, enedomeyini yayo esebenza ngama-enzyme echayeke ebusweni bamaseli emaphashini nakwezinye izicubu.
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I membrane protein with a single channel, whose enzyme-active domain is exposed on the surface of cells in the lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Idomeyini yangaphandle kweseli ye-ACE2 ihlukaniswa ukusuka kudomeyini ye-transmembrane nge-enzyme eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-sheddase, futhi iphrotheni encibilikayo eba khona ikhishelwa egazini futhi ekugcineni iphumela emchamweni.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by an enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood and eventually into the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: I-ACE2 ikhona ezakhini zomzimba eziningi: i-ACE2 ihlangene nolwelwesi lweseli ikakhulu lwamaseli ohlobo II e-alveolar, ama-enterocytes amathumbu amancane, amaseli e-arterial nawe-venous endothelial namaseli ezicubu abushelelezi e-arterial ezakhini zomzimba eziningi.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in many tissues: ACE2 is associated with cell membranes mainly of type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth tissue cells in many tissues.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: I-ACE2 mRNA itholakala naku-cerebral cortex, ku-striatum, ku-hypothalamus, naku-brainstem.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Umsebenzi oyinhloko we-ACE2 uwukusebenza njengebhalansi ye-ACE.
en-mt: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a balancer for ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: I-ACE ihlukanisa ihomoni ye-angiotensin I ibe yi-vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
en-mt: ACE splits the hormone angiotensin I into the vasoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: I-ACE2 ihlukanisa i-carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine ukusuka ku-angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) bese uyihlukanisa ibe yi-vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: ACE2 cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and splits it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H- Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ingaphinde ihlukanise amanye ama-peptides amaningana okubandakanya i-[des-Arg9]-bradykinin, i-apelin, i-neurotensin, i-dynorphin A, ne-ghrelin.
en-mt: ACE2 can also cleave several other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: I-ACE2 iphinde ilawule ukuhamba kolwelwesi lwe-neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 futhi luhlanganisiwe esifweni sika-Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates the membrane mobility of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Njengephrotheni eliyi-transmembrane, i-ACE2 isebenza njengendawo yokungena eyinhloko kumaseli ama-coronavirus athile, okubandakanya i-HCoV-NL63; i-SARS-CoV (igciwane elibangela i-SARS); ne-SARS-CoV-2 (igciwane elibangela i-COVID-19).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the primary entry point into cells of certain coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Ngokuqondile, ukuhlangana kwephrotheni le-spike S1 ye-SARS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV2 kudomeyini eyi-enzyme ye-ACE2 ebusweni bamaseli kuphumela ku-endocytosis nakuhambeni kwakho kokubili igciwane ne-enzyme kuye ku-endosomes ephakathi kwamaseli.
en-mt: Specifically, binding of the spike protein S1 of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzyme domain of ACE2 on the cell surface results in endocytosis and movement of both virus and enzyme into intracellular endosomes.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Le nqubo yokungena iphinde idinge ukwenza i-S protein lenziwe lisebenze yi-serine protease TMPRSS2, isivimbeli esingaphansi kophenyo lwamanje njengesingaba yikhambi lesifo. Lokhu kuye kwaholela abathile ukuba baphethe ngokuthi ukunciphisa amaleveli e-ACE2, kumaseli, kungasiza ekulweni negciwane.
en-mt: This entry process also requires the S protein to be activated by the serine protease TMPRSS2, an inhibitor that is currently under investigation as a potential cure for the disease. This has led some to conclude that reducing ACE2 levels, in cells, may help fight the virus.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Nokho, izinhlangano eziningi eziphambili nezindikimba ezisebenzayo zikhuthaze ukuqhubeka ngesivimbeli esivamile se-ACE nokwelapha nge-ARB.
en-mt: However, many leading organizations and working groups have advocated continuation of conventional ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Ukubuyekeza okuhleliwe nokuhlaziya okushicilelwe ngo-July 11, 2012, kuthole ukuthi "ukusebenzisa izivimbeli ze-ACE kwakuhlobene nokuncipha okukhulu okungu-34% engozini ye-pneumonia uma kuqhathaniswa nezilawuli."
en-mt: A systematic review and analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a 34% significant reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared to controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, "ingozi ye-pneumonia iye yancishiswa ezigulini ezelashwa ngezivimbeli ze-ACE ebezisengozini enkulu ye-pneumonia, ikakhulu lezo ezisifo sikanhlangothi nenhliziyo.
en-mt: In addition, "the risk of pneumonia was reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at high risk of pneumonia, especially those with stroke and heart disease.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwezivimbeli ze-ACE kuye kwaphinde kwahlotshaniswa nokuncipha kweziguli ezibulawa yi-pneumonia, nakuba imiphumela ibingemibi kangako kunomonakalo ongadalwa yi-pneumonia."
en-mt: The use of ACE inhibitors has also been associated with a reduction in the number of patients dying from pneumonia, although the results were less severe than the damage caused by pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Isakhi esiyinhlanganisela somuntu i-ACE2 (rhACE2) kucatshangelwa ukuthi siyindlela yokwelapha entsha yokulimala kwephaphu okubi kakhulu, futhi kubonakala kuthuthukisa i-pulmonary hemodynamics ukuphuma komoya-mpilo ezingulubeni ezine-lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is considered a new treatment for acute lung injury, and appears to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygenation in pigs with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Uhhafu we-rhACE2 kubantu uthatha amahora angu-10 ukusebenza futhi uqala ukusebenza ngemva kwemizuzu engu-30 ngaphezu kwesikhathi osisebenzayo (inkathi) engamahora angu-24.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans takes 10 hours to become active and begins to work 30 minutes later than its active period (period) of 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Ucwaningo oluthile lubonisa ukuthi i-rhACE2 lungaba umuthi ofanele walabo abangakwazi ukuphuza ama-renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) avamile noma ezifweni lapho i-angiotensin II ejikezelayo isidlondlobele. Ukugcwaliswa kwe-rhACE2 kuye kwahlolwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha ekwelapheni i-acute respiratory distress syndrome.
en-mt: Some studies show that rhACE2 may be an appropriate drug for those who cannot take conventional renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is excessive. RhACE2 supplementation has been tested in clinical trials in the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Ama-app e-b'COVID-19 ayizinhlelo zesofthiwe yeselula eziklanyelwe ukusiza uthole izinombolo ngokuqondene nomqedazwe wango-2019-20 we-coronavirus, njengenqubo yokuthola abantu ("abathintwayo") okungenzeka baye bathintana nomuntu onegciwane.
en-mt: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software programs designed to help you find numbers regarding the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, such as the process of finding people ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa noma kwacatshangelwa izinhlelo eziningana, ngokusekela komthetho kahulumeni kwezinye izindawo.
en-mt: Several programs have been established or considered, with the support of government legislation in some areas.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa amafremuwekhi okwakha ama-app okuthungatha othintwayo.
en-mt: Frameworks have been developed for building contact tracing apps.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Kuye kwavezwa ukukhathazeka kobumfihlo, ikakhulukazi mayelana namasistimu asekelwe ekulandeleleni indawo abasebenzisi be-app abakuyo.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, particularly regarding systems based on tracking the location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ezinye izindlela ezingadingi ulwazi oluyimfihlo zibandakanya ukusetshenziswa kwamasignali eBluetooth ukuze kufakwe indawo umsebenzisi akuyo kwamanye amaselula.
en-mt: Other methods that do not require private information include the use of Bluetooth signals to transmit the user's location to other mobile phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple zamemezela ukuthi zizokwakha indlela ukuze zisekele ama-app anjalo eBluetooth ngokuqondile kuma-OS e-Android ne-iOS.
en-mt: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple announced that they will build a way to support such Bluetooth apps directly on Android and iOS OSes.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: EChina, uhulumeni waseChina, usebenzelana ne-Alipay, usungule i-app evumela izakhamuzi ukuba zihlole ukuthi ziye zathintana yini nabantu abane-COVID-19.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, working with Alipay, has developed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Isetshenziswa emadolobheni angaphezu kuka-200 eChina. ESingapore, kusetshenziswa i-app ebizwa ngokuthi yi-TraceTogether.
en-mt: It is used in more than 200 cities in China. In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa izisebenzi ze-IT zasendaweni, yakhishwa njengewuthombo ovulekile futhi izonikezwa uhulumeni. ENyakatho Macedonia kwakhishwa i-"StopKorona!", i-app esebenza ngeBluetooth ukuze kulandelelwe ukuchayeka kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane futhi kunikezwe ukusabela okusheshayo eziphathimandleni zezempilo.
en-mt: This app was developed by local IT staff, released as open source and will be provided by the government. In North Macedonia "StopKorona!" was released, a Bluetooth-enabled app to track exposure to people who may be infected and provide a quick response to health authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa uMnyango Wezokuxhumana Nezobuchwepheshe noMnyango Wezempilo.
en-mt: This app was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-14 April 2020, le app yayilindele ukugunyazwa yi-Google Play Store ne-Apple App Store.
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, this app was awaiting approval from the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Ngomhla ka-12 April, uhulumeni wathi i-app yokuthungatha umuntu yayisezingeni elithuthukile lokusungulwa, futhi yayizotholakalela ukukhishwa emavikini ambalwa. Kulungiselelwa i-app efanayo e-Ireland, naseFrance ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On April 12, the government said the tracking app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for release in a few weeks. A similar app is being prepared in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Kokubili i-Australia neNew Zealand zicabangela ama-app asekelwe ku-app yaseSingapore i-TraceTogether nephrothokholi ye-BlueTrace. IRussia ihlose ukusungula i-app ebonisayo lapho umuntu eqa imingcele ayibekelwe yeziguli ezitholwe zine-COVID-19 ezihlala eMoscow, eklanyelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abaphumi emakhaya.
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia intends to develop an app that shows when someone crosses the limits set for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure that they do not leave their homes.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: URoss Anderson, uprofesa ongunjiniyela kwezokuvikeleka eCambridge University, ubale izinto eziningana ezingaba yinkinga ngamasistimu e-app, okubandakanya izixwayiso ezidukisayo namathuba okungasitholi isixwayiso uma amandla e-app elinganiselwe enanini elincane kuphela labantu.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, a professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed several potential problems with app systems, including misleading warnings and the possibility of not receiving a warning if the app's power is limited to only a small number of people.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Ukuze ixazulule izinkinga ezimayelana nokubhebhetheka kwama-app "e-coronavirus" adukisayo noma ayingozi, i-Apple ibeke imingcele ezinhlotsheni zezinhlangano ezingafaka ama-app e-coronavirus ku-App Store yayo, yathi kuzoba yilawo "asemthethweni" kuphela noma izinhlangano ezethenjwayo.
en-mt: To address concerns about the spread of misleading or dangerous "coronavirus" apps, Apple has placed restrictions on the types of organizations that can install coronavirus apps on its App Store, saying they will only be "legitimate" or trusted organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: I-Google ne-Amazon zisungule imingcele efanayo.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have established similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Amaqabane alwela ubumfihlo aveze ukukhathazeka kwawo ngokuqondene nezinkinga zokuthungatha uquqaba lwabantu kusetshenziswa ama-app e-coronavirus, ngokukhethekile mayelana nokuthi uhlelo lokuthungatha olusungulelwe ukusingatha umqedazwe we-coronavirus luzoqaqwa lapho lolu songo seludlulile.
en-mt: Privacy advocates have expressed their concern about the problems of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, especially about whether the surveillance system created to handle the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: I-Amnesty International nezinye izinhlangano ezingaphezu kuka-100 zikhiphe isitatimende esibeka imingcele kulolu hlobo lokuthungatha.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued a statement condemning this type of search.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Lezi zinhlangano zimise imibandela eyisishiyagalolunye kumaphrojekthi kahulumeni:
en-mt: These organizations set nine criteria for government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: ukuthungatha kufanele kube "semthethweni, okudingekile futhi kufaneleke";
en-mt: the search must be "lawful, necessary and reasonable";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ukwelulwa kwenkathi yokuqapha nokuthungatha kufanele kube nemibandela yokushona kwelanga;
en-mt: the extension of the surveillance and search period should be subject to sunset conditions;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kuzofanele kulinganiselwe ezinjongweni ze-COVID-19;
en-mt: the use of data will have to be limited to the purposes of COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ukuvikeleka kwedatha nokungaziwa kwamagama kuzodingeka kuvikelwe futhi kuboniswe njengokuvikelwe ngokusekelwe ebufakazini;
en-mt: data security and anonymity will need to be protected and demonstrated as protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ukuhlolwa okuyidijithali kuzofanele kugweme ukwehlisa ububi bobandlululo nokunciphisa ukubaluleka kwezinto;
en-mt: digital assessment should avoid diminishing the evils of racism and diminishing the value of things;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: noma ikuphi ukwabelana ngedatha nabanye abantu kuzofanelwe kuchazwe ngokomthetho;
en-mt: any sharing of data with third parties will be subject to legal requirements;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: kuzofanele kube nokuqapha ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kabi kanye namalungelo ezakhamuzi okusabela ekusetshenzisweni kabi;
en-mt: there will have to be vigilance against misuse and citizens' rights to respond to misuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ukuhlanganyela ngendlela ewusizo yibo bonke "abaneqhaza" kuzodingeka, okubandakanya ochwepheshe bezempilo bomphakathi namaqembu amancane. I-German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) ne-Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) nazo zikhiphe izinhlu zokuhlola.
en-mt: Effective participation by all "stakeholders" will be required, including community health professionals and small groups. The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) have also issued checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Uhlelo oluhlongozwayo lwe-Google/Apple luhlose ukulungisa inkinga yokulandelelwa njalo ngokukhipha umsebenzi wokuthungatha kuma-OS edivayisi lapho ungasadingeki.
en-mt: The proposed Google/Apple plan aims to fix the constant tracking problem by removing tracking functionality from device OSes when it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Amanye amazwe abesebenzisa ukuthungatha indawo ngokusekelwe kunethiwekhi kunama-app, okuqeda kokubili isidingo sokudawuniloda i-app nokugwema ukulandelelwa.
en-mt: Some countries have used network-based location tracking rather than apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and avoiding tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: E-Israel, ukulandelela okusekelwe kunethiwekhi kwagunyazwa.
en-mt: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Izixazululo ezisekelwe kunethiwekhi ezinokufinyelela kudatha yendawo engahlungiwe zingaba nezinkinga ezinkulu zobumfihlo.
en-mt: Network-based solutions with access to unfiltered location data can have serious privacy issues.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Nokho, akuwona wonke amasistimu anamaseva amakhulu okudingeka athole ukufinyelela kudatha yendawo yomuntu; inani lamasistimu avikela ubumfihlo liye lakhiwa asebenzisa amaseva amakhulu ukuze axhumane kuphela (bheka isigaba esingezansi).
en-mt: However, not all systems with large servers need to gain access to a person's location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been developed that use large servers for communication only (see the section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: ENingizimu Korea, isistimu engasekelwe ku-app yasetshenziswa ukuze kulandelelwe umuntu.
en-mt: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to track a person.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa i-app eqokiwe, isistimu iqongelela ulwazi lokuthungatha emithonjeni ehlukahlukene okubandakanya idatha yokulandelela idivayisi eyiselula nedatha yokuthenga ngekhadi, futhi ihlanganise lokhu ukuze ithumele izaziso ngemiyalezo yombhalo kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane.
en-mt: Instead of using a designated app, the system collects tracking information from various sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combines this to send notifications via text messages to potentially infected people.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokusebenzisa lolu lwazi ukuze kuxwayiswe abantu okungenzeka bathole igciwane, uhulumeni iphinde yenza ulwazi lwendawo lwatholakalela umphakathi, okuyinto evunyelwe ngenxa yezinguquko eziningi emithethweni yobumfihlo ngemva kokuqubuka kwe-MERS kulelo zwe.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to warn people who may have contracted the virus, the government is also making location information available to the public, which is allowed due to many changes in privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Lolu lwazi lutholakalela umphakathi ngama-app namawebusayithi. Amazwe abandakanya iGermany acabangele ukusebenzisa kokubili amasistimu amakhulu nalawo avikela ubumfihlo.
en-mt: This information is available to the public through apps and websites. Countries including Germany have considered implementing both large-scale and privacy-protecting systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-6 April 2020, imininingwane ayikakhishwa.
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, details have not been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ukulandelela okuvikela ubumfihlo buyindlela eklanywe kahle, enezincwadi zocwaningo eziningi ezisukela emuva okungenani ngo-2013. Kusukela ngomhla ka-7 April 2020, amaqembu ochwepheshe angaphezu kuka-12 abefuna izisombululo ezikwamukelayo ubumfihlo, njengokusebenzisa i-Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ukuze usondelanise umsebenzisi namanye amaselula.
en-mt: Privacy-preserving tracking is a well-established approach, with extensive research literature dating back to at least 2013. As of April 7, 2020, more than 12 expert groups were looking for privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to connect the user to other mobile phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Nokho, i-PEPP-PT ingumzamo wokuxhumanisa oqukethe kokubili izindlela ezinkulu nezihlukahlukene, futhi ayiyona iphrothokholi eyodwa. Amaphrothokholi ahlukahlukene abandakanya i-Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), i-Temporary Contact Numbers (i-TCN, i-fka Contact Event Numbers, i-CEN), i-Privacy Sensitive Protocols ne-Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) namanye.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordination effort that contains both large and diverse approaches, and is not a single protocol. Various protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Kulawa maphrothokholi, idatha yomuntu ebonakalayo ayilokothi ishiye idivayisi, futhi konke ukumatanisa kwenzeka kudivayisi.
en-mt: In these protocols, a person's physical data never leaves the device, and all pairing takes place on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: I-Privacy Group e-MIT Media Lab ibilokhu isungula i-SafePaths, ipulatifomu yokusebenzisa amasu okuvikela ubumfihlo lapho iqongelela futhi isebenzisa indawo noma idatha engumzila oyisinqamuleli ukuze kulandelelwe ukubhebhetheka kwe-COVID-19.
